formulas.name: f_Formula_for_Brand
formulas.expression: IF(OR( BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "GT"), BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "EE"), BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "EM"), BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "ER"), BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "II"), BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "DC") ), LEFT({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, 2), IF(OR( BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "GOV"), BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "CDG"), BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "CDE"), BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "NAV") ), LEFT({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, 3), IF( BEGINS({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, "PCIO") ,LEFT({!var_Brand_from_Ticket}, 4),"")))
